definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]

sentences.english: The latter will move back, watching to the Englishman.
sentences.chinese: 后者将回迁，看向英国人。

sentences.english: Usual Englishman or Englishwoman can indicate the road for you on the street.
sentences.chinese: 通常英国人在街上是会给你指路的。

sentences.english: And if you are English, you'd avidly defend your words.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是英国人，你会迫切地要捍卫你的文字。

sentences.english: Needless to say, the British made no attempt to introduce anti-racist legislation.
sentences.chinese: 不用说，英国人是懒得在香港对反种族主义立法的。

sentences.english: He realized early that the best strategy was to harass the British.
sentences.chinese: 他很早就认识到，最好的战略就是骚扰英国人。

sentences.english: The Britishmen arrived on the American coasts.
If an Englishman gets run down by a truck, he apologizes to the truck.
sentences.chinese: 如果一个英国人被一辆卡车撞倒，他向卡车道歉。

sentences.english: Us is the freeborn Brit or the forgotten men and women of America.
sentences.chinese: 我们是生而自由的英国人或者美国被遗忘的人们。

sentences.english: She is English, so we laughed.
sentences.chinese: 她是个英国人，我们都笑了。

sentences.english: The English are, as often as not, labeled conservative. Obviously this label is prejudiced.
sentences.chinese: 英国人常常被回类为守旧型，显然这一回类带有成见。

sentences.english: I patiently filled him in on the British tradition of sherry tippling .
sentences.chinese: 我耐心细致地给他讲述了英国人畅饮雪利酒的传统。

sentences.english: The British are quite likely to learn foreign languages but tend not to be well-travelled.
sentences.chinese: 英国人非常喜欢学外语，但却并不爱旅游。

sentences.english: The Brit lives in the red house.
Roads account for 90% of all passenger journeys made in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 公路交通占英国人出行比重的90%。

sentences.english: It used to be said that English people take their pleasures sadly.
sentences.chinese: 人们常说英国人哪怕遇上乐事也还是落落寡欢。

sentences.english: that you know, the British stole over hundreds of years from different nations.
sentences.chinese: 英国人几百年前从不同国家偷来的。

definition: United Kingdom 聯合王國|联合王国[Lian2 he2 wang2 guo2]/United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland/abbr. for England 英格蘭|英格兰[Ying1 ge2 lan2]
